name: Chicken Chuck
description:
The chickens have flown the coop and its up to you to chuck them back in.

Created for the  VimJam: Collectables 8 Bits to Infinity Game Jam. 

This is my first game that I have brought past basic prototyping as I finally decided to learn how to create simple assets. Its stylized to be in a psx retro style with the jittery and warped textures. 

I enjoyed making it and hope you enjoy your short time  playing it
